lead_paragraph: JOHN R. LIVINGSTON.--The death of John R. Livingston, Esq., is announced at Red Hook, at the remarkable age of 08--almost a century old. John R. Livingston has been the survivor of a very remarkable and distinguished family. The most eminent of the family were Chancellor Livingston, of New-York, and the celebrated Edward Livingston, of Louisiana.
